greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Expansion of (1 - 3*x^2 - 3*x^3 + x^4)/(1 + x^4).
comment: Row sums of Riordan array (1-x-2x^2,x(1-x)), A109246.
After the initial terms, cyclic with period 8: [0,0,-3,-3,0,0,3,3]. - _Antti Karttunen_, Aug 12 2017
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..8191
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (0,0,0,-1).
formula: For n > 0, a(n) = -3 * A132380(n). - _Antti Karttunen_, Aug 12 2017
program: (Scheme) (define (A109247 n) (case n ((0) 1) ((1 4) 0) ((2 3) -3) (else (- (A109247 (- n 4)))))) ;; (After _Harvey P. Dale_'s Mar 24 2012 recurrence) - _Antti Karttunen_, Aug 12 2017
results.author: _Paul Barry_, Jun 23 2005
